channel.title: Valorian! [Multi-Verse - 3 Worlds] [McMMo] [Survival] [PvP] [Creative]
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/guLEx.jpg[/img]
[u]Valorian Ip - 198.136.62.70[/u] [u]Valorian Website - www.mcvalorian.com[/u]
[u]A little bit about Valorian - [/u] Valorian is a 3 world server in which players get the chance to play how they like; a lot of players like to PvP and grief so instead of just letting them reek havoc on the Survival world we created a world purely for Pvp, griefing, raiding and factions. Also many players just like to get straight to the building without having to explore or gather materials, so for players like this Valorian Creative is ideal as they can fly and spawn items and build as they wish. Besides the reasons stated above, we created these worlds so we could build a community with Valorian for example, players can join factions in PvP meaning they can work as teams and on creative players can build big projects together and bring them closer that way. To us this is important as we'd like our players to feel comfortable and enjoy their time playing.
[u]A few of our Rules -[/u] As we use McBans not only do we follow by their banning guidelines we also have rules of our own - - No Advertising on the server - No Excessive Caps, Swearing or Spam - No griefing (Also a McBans rule)(Griefing is allowed on the PvP world) - No Homophobia, Sexism or Racism (Also McBans rules)
[u]A few of our Plugins - [/u] [b]Here is a list of our most important plugins - [/b] - iConomy - HawkEye - McBans - ChestShop - Essentials - LWC - WorldGuard - Multiverse - McMMo These are just a few of our many plugins that make Valorian.
[u]Valorian Ranks -[/u] We have 2 types of rank; [b]Donation Ranks -[/b] - Supporter ($5) - Donator ($10) - VIP ($25) - DM ($50) - Architect ($100)
[b]Staff Ranks -[/b] - Intern - Moderator - HeadModerator - Admin - HeadAdmin - Owner (GabeHirsch)
Note - If a player has a purple tilde (~) by their name it means they are OP Our OP's are GabeHirsch, xEchoo and BenM4131
Thanks for reading and if you'd like to know anything more about Valorian, ask in the comments below

item.title: Valorian! [Multi-Verse - 3 Worlds] [McMMo] [Survival] [PvP] [Creative]
item.dc:creator: @BenM4131 BenM4131
item.description:
@BenM4131 wrote:

guLEx.jpg800×600

Valorian Ip - 198.136.62.70 Valorian Website - www.mcvalorian.com

A little bit about Valorian -
Valorian is a 3 world server in which players get the chance to play how they like; a lot of players like to PvP and grief so instead of just letting them reek havoc on the Survival world we created a world purely for Pvp, griefing, raiding and factions. Also many players just like to get straight to the building without having to explore or gather materials, so for players like this Valorian Creative is ideal as they can fly and spawn items and build as they wish. Besides the reasons stated above, we created these worlds so we could build a community with Valorian for example, players can join factions in PvP meaning they can work as teams and on creative players can build big projects together and bring them closer that way. To us this is important as we’d like our players to feel comfortable and enjoy their time playing.

A few of our Rules -
As we use McBans not only do we follow by their banning guidelines we also have rules of our own -

  • No Advertising on the server
  • No Excessive Caps, Swearing or Spam
  • No griefing (Also a McBans rule)(Griefing is allowed on the PvP world)
  • No Homophobia, Sexism or Racism (Also McBans rules)

A few of our Plugins -
Here is a list of our most important plugins -

  • iConomy
  • HawkEye
  • McBans
  • ChestShop
  • Essentials
  • LWC
  • WorldGuard
  • Multiverse
  • McMMo
    These are just a few of our many plugins that make Valorian.

Valorian Ranks -
We have 2 types of rank;
Donation Ranks -

  • Supporter ($5)
  • Donator ($10)
  • VIP ($25)
  • DM ($50)
  • Architect ($100)

Staff Ranks -

  • Intern
  • Moderator
  • HeadModerator
  • Admin
  • HeadAdmin
  • Owner (GabeHirsch)

Note - If a player has a purple tilde (~) by their name it means they are OP
Our OP’s are GabeHirsch, xEchoo and BenM4131

Thanks for reading and if you’d like to know anything more about Valorian, ask in the comments below
